title: Retirement Advisor: Something Is Right-On In Denmark
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The World Economic Forum posted a video about what it calls “the global pensions time bomb,” noting that the already large gap between resources and retirement is rapidly accelerating. This podcast (7:48) suggests that the approach taken by Denmark is right for our times, more so than the Chilean model, and discusses other U.S. retirement-system vulnerabilities. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
